title: Toronto Police Arrest Suspect in 1983 Cold Case Murders
description: Sean McCowan, right, reacts as he stands Kaelin McCowan, brothers of Erin Gilmour and partner Clair Kilgour after a press conference in Toronto on Monday November 28, 2022. Toronto police say they’ve arrested a 61-year-old man in the DNA-linked cold-case murders of Gilmour and Susan Tice, who were found dead in their homes within months of each other almost four decades ago. THE CANADIAN PRESS/Chris Young
